name: Hansel & Gretel VR
description:
Abandoned by their stepmother and wandering in the woods, Hansel and Gretel enter a confectionery shop they find by chance while enduring their hunger.

The brothers and sisters eat sweets in a hurry and are trapped in a fantasy house built by a witch.

Meanwhile, in the house of sweets, there are magical sweets that go back and forth between the real world and the fantasy world that even witches don't know...

This game only works on Oculus.

Your Oculus must be connected to the same Wi-Fi network.

Install the apk file as a sidequest.

You can't play alone.

Two players must play together.
